metadata.synopsis: Players wake from a sleeping spell/potion to find themselves chained, captive, in a cellar. The last thing they remember is accepting help from the goblin priestess, who has now captured them. She is sadistic and takes great pleasure in explaining that they're going to become mindflayers due to the parasite in their head, and that she's going to keep them trapped here until that happens.Barbarian characters can break free at the end if they succeed a strength check. Combat with Gut ensues.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game (not as a Drow).2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 298.109; 36.973; -164. Talk to Priestess Gut > accept the brand > accept her help with the tadpole > follow her > talk to her again and say yes.5. Let her rummage into your brain > tell her to get it out > i'm ready.6. Drink the potion.

35.speaker: True Soul Gut
35.text: Wakey wakey. Don't bother strugglin' - you ain't goin' nowhere.
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallInternalNodeContext: Character was kidnapped and chained by priestNodeContext: malicious - she pretended to be our friend and now she's chained us to a wall. Should be a real change in tone from everyhing before this branch - true nature revealed, and it's not pretty

27.speaker: True Soul Gut
27.text: You might think you're in charge - but you ain't a drow anymore. Yer a flesh-puppet.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: Malicious glee at having the upper-hand

37.speaker: True Soul Gut
37.text: The Absolute wants to know all about that critter in your head. So start talkin'!
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious; has the player chained and captive

31.speaker: Player
31.text: I was abducted... A mind flayer infected me with this thing.

21.speaker: True Soul Gut
21.text: I know that much. I saw the whole horrible story in your memories.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious and excited; has the player chained and captive

15.speaker: True Soul Gut
15.text: And I know what happens next. Your teeth fall out, your skin rips off, and you turn into one of them.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: You're out of luck. I don't know any more about it than you do.

36.speaker: True Soul Gut
36.text: Liar! We've both seen the monster that put it there. And I know what happens next.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious and excited; has the player chained and captive

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I'll make you pay for this, goblin.

39.speaker: True Soul Gut
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wall - hits them in the faceNodeContext: Angry, slaps the player in the face, yelling on first sentence, malicious and excited; has the player chained and captive

20.speaker: True Soul Gut
20.text: Can't beat you too hard, though. Got to keep you alive for what comes next.

22.speaker: True Soul Gut
22.text: If I set you free, you'll be sucking out my brains as soon as I turn my back.
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: too smart to fall for our tricks; has the player chained and captive

19.speaker: True Soul Gut
19.text: That creature's turning your brain into broth, boiling away your memories.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious and excited, describing the horrors to come; has the player chained and captive

10.speaker: True Soul Gut
10.text: Do you even know who you are anymore?
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious; has the player chained and captive

11.speaker: Player
11.text: I have... powers. Something's changing in me.

29.speaker: True Soul Gut
29.text: Powers? No. They're delusions. That thing's eating your brain.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious and excited, describing the horrors to come; has the player chained and captive

17.speaker: Player
17.text: I know I'm going to kill you. How about that?

33.speaker: Player
33.text: I am the Demonsbane, champion of Avernus. You don't frighten me.

13.speaker: True Soul Gut
13.text: It's not me you need to be frightened of - it's what that thing in your head is gonna do to you.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: I am Lae'zel. And I have slaughtered the likes of you ten times over.

51.speaker: True Soul Gut
51.text: You ain't gonna lay a finger on me. You're finished.
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious; has the player chained and captive

38.speaker: True Soul Gut
38.text: And I don't have to do nothing but wait. That thing inside your head is gonna eat your brain from the inside out.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious and excited, describing the horrors to come; has the player chained and captive

59.speaker: True Soul Gut
59.text: And eventually your skull will split and you'll cough up a mess of tentacles.
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious and excited, describing the horrors to come; has the player chained and captive

50.speaker: True Soul Gut
50.text: Stop it? Why would I wanna do that?
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious; has the player chained and captive

56.speaker: Player
56.text: No, I'm not going to let that happen.

8.speaker: True Soul Gut
8.text: Think you're special, do you? You're not.
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious; has the player chained and captive

48.speaker: True Soul Gut
48.text: I'm gonna keep you here so I can see every gory detail, and hear every whimper and scream.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious and excited, describing the horrors to come; has the player chained and captive

53.speaker: Player
53.text: If I do transform, you'll be my first meal.

60.speaker: True Soul Gut
60.text: Not likely. You're forgetting one thing - I've got the Absolute to protect me.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: gloating; has the player chained and captive

30.speaker: True Soul Gut
30.text: But you? You're on your own. Nothing more than a skin-suit for that monster inside you.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious; has the player chained and captive

23.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player breaks free from their chains and stands before Gut

54.speaker: True Soul Gut
54.text: Wha...? No! Some one c'mere and help me - NOW!
54.context: InternalNodeContext: Combat ensuesNodeContext: Incredulous, frantic. The player just burst free of their restraints before her eyes, (Combat ensues)

42.speaker: True Soul Gut
42.text: Oh look how they struggle! Don't do yourself a mischief, now.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player struggles against their chains, to little effect. Priestess Gut chuckles with amusement.NodeContext: First sentence spoken with an amused chuckle. 'Oh you silly thing'

9.speaker: True Soul Gut
9.text: You're so adorable when you're angry, pet. Pity those looks'll be torn open before long. Ah well...
9.context: NodeContext: Creepy affection. 'Ah well' said with an airy 'c’est la vie' tone.

61.speaker: True Soul Gut
61.text: You're gonna be my new pet. A ferocious squiddie, all for myself.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious; has the player chained and captive

64.speaker: Player
64.text: You're infected. The same thing will happen to you.

32.speaker: True Soul Gut
32.text: Lies! I'm stronger than ever. And I've got the Absolute on my side.
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: gloating; has the player chained and captive

18.speaker: Player
18.text: You won't live to see it, trust me.

58.speaker: True Soul Gut
58.text: You might have put up a fight in another life, freak. But not in this one.
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious; has the player chained and captive

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I am the Blade of Frontiers. You don't frighten me.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: The prophet of the end, the armageddon-watcher. You are nothing.

26.speaker: True Soul Gut
26.text: Maybe that's wot the creature wants you to think.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious; has the player chained and captive

63.speaker: True Soul Gut
63.text: It's gonna start eating your flesh, too. Changing you.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: malicious and excited, describing the horrors to come; has the player chained and captive

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Weren't you supposed to be helping me?

24.speaker: True Soul Gut
24.text: It's too late to help you. It already was.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: mocking, malicious; has the player chained and captive

28.speaker: Player
28.text: You're infected. It's going to happen to you, too.

7.speaker: True Soul Gut
7.text: Stop trying to confuse me. You're a liar.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wall - hits them in the faceNodeContext: Angry, slaps the player in the face, yelling on first sentence, malicious and excited; has the player chained and captive

49.speaker: True Soul Gut
49.text: Everything's clear since the Absolute chose me. You're the one that's broken.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to character who is chained to a wallNodeContext: trying to convince herself; a bit confused; has the player chained and captive
